3330/A0/05/883/001.indicator_name: SITAN on children  adolescents and families
3330/A0/05/883/001.headline: Compared to previous years  2016 provided limited opportunities in terms of moving forward with strengthening administrative data systems due to the change in the leadership in INEC.

3330/A0/05/883/002.headline: UNICEF´s work in partnership with religious leaders  Aliados por la Niñez  and ODENA yielded visibility on issues related to violence prevention  comprehensive protection system and other priority child rights issues.

3330/A0/05/883/003.indicator_name: Public-Private partnership in support of child rights  particularly in education
3330/A0/05/883/003.headline: There was significant momentum for corporate initiatives on child rights as a result of a partnership with SUMARSE. Evidence generation  capacity building  convening power  and technical assistance positioned UNICEF as a key ally for the CSR programmes in Panama.

3330/A0/04/101/004.indicator_name: Número de universidades panameñas que realizan como parte de su trabajo regular análisis e investigación sobre temas vinculados con políticas públicas y derechos de la niñez

3330/A0/04/101/002.status_value: En alianza con UNCT  UNICEF realizando un mapeo de sistemas de información para proponer estrategia concertada
3330/A0/04/101/002.indicator_name: Número de Ministerios u órganos gubernamentales del sector social produciendo y analizando de manera cualitativa y cuantitativa los indicadores de niñez y adolescencia para elaborar sus planes  presupuestos y políticas públicas para niños basados en la evidencia

3330/A0/04/101/003.status_value: ODENA cuenta con marco para monitoreo para recomendaciones de CDN y CEDAW.  Durante 2013 ampliará su capacidad técnica y los mecanismos operativos.
3330/A0/04/101/003.indicator_name: Capacidad técnica  y mecanismos establecidos y operativos para monitorear y dar seguimiento a la implementación de derechos internacionales  especialmente los de CDN y CEDAW para los tomadores de decisiones dentro de Panamá y para los Comités de DDHH en Ginebra para evaluar el progreso del Estado

3330/A0/04/101/001.indicator_name: Número de Ministerios u Órganos Gubernamentales utilizando DEVINFO/SINAMP para monitorear los ODM que afectan a la niñez panameña
% de niños indígenas de los Municipios de Kankintú  Kusapin  Mironó  Muna y Cémaco con acceso a servicios culturalmente adecuados
Costos directos e indirectos de acceder a servicios de salud para usuarios con niños de 0-6 años en Kankintú  Kusapín  Mironó  Muna  y Cémaco

3330/A0/04/301/011.status_value: Existe un borrador de la Estrategia Nacional de Reducción de Riesgos en Desastres que incorpora los CCC.
3330/A0/04/301/011.indicator_name: CCC incorporados de forma integral en la Estrategia Nacional de Reducción de Riesgos en Desastres

3330/A0/04/301/010.status_value: 0 - se trabajó en el fortalecimiento de servicios amigables para adolescentes  particularmente servicios de prevención de la violencia  servicios de salud  y servicios para el desarrollo y participación de adolescentes.
3330/A0/04/301/010.indicator_name: Existencia de planes locales y marcos de monitoreo para el desarrollo y la participación adolescente

3330/A0/05/881/002.indicator_name: Conceptual model for educational inclusion of adolescents in San Miguelito
3330/A0/05/881/002.headline: UNICEF supported the Government of Panama in the formulation of an evidenced-based model of the intervention that would allow adolescents and youth up to 19 in the San Miguelito District to return to school.

3330/A0/05/881/002.indicator_name: Schools that received support from UNICEF Through the child-friendly school or similar model
3330/A0/05/881/002.headline: UNICEF supported the Government of Panama in the formulation of an evidenced-based model of the intervention that would allow adolescents and youth up to 19 in the San Miguelito District to return to school.

3330/A0/05/881/003.indicator_name: Road map for implementation of EIB en Comarca NB
3330/A0/05/881/003.headline: There was significant progress in the identification of key priorities to fulfill the rights of indigenous children to education  and to leverage this through the  National Development Plan for Indigenous Comarcas.

3330/A0/05/881/003.indicator_name: Classrooms provided with classroom education materiales delivered in the children´s mother tongue and pertinent to the children´s cultural heritage-funded by UNICEF
3330/A0/05/881/003.headline: There was significant progress in the identification of key priorities to fulfill the rights of indigenous children to education  and to leverage this through the  National Development Plan for Indigenous Comarcas.

3330/A0/05/881/001.status_value: There is a draft policy for early education and other policy instruments that are being validated.
3330/A0/05/881/001.headline: Panama moved forward in drafting policy instruments specific for early education. The multisectoral coordinating mechanism for early childhood received UNICEF support to move forward in the implementation of the RAIPI.

3330/A0/05/881/001.indicator_name: Early learning policy and early programme including quality early learning curriculum and standards - score (1-4)  see guidance
3330/A0/05/881/001.headline: Panama moved forward in drafting policy instruments specific for early education. The multisectoral coordinating mechanism for early childhood received UNICEF support to move forward in the implementation of the RAIPI.

3330/A0/04/401/013.status_value: En 2013 se presentaron los 10 casos de aplicación de los Principios de Negocios en empresas con programas de RSE en Panamá.

Cobertura universal de Registro de nacimiento

3330/A0/04/201/005.status_value: Edad minima para contraer matrimonio fue homologada a través de modificación del Código de la Familia en abril de 2015. Esta modificación establece 18 años para contraer matrimonio.
3330/A0/04/201/005.indicator_name: Edad mínima para contraer matrimonio está homologada a los 18 para chicos y chicas

3330/A0/04/201/006.status_value: Consultoría para desarrollo de estrategia pendiente de ser contratada durante primer trimestre de 2013
3330/A0/04/201/006.indicator_name: Existe una estrategia para prevenir todas las formas de violencia contra la niñez y adolescencia basada en las recomendaciones del Comité de la CDN y las del Estudio Mundial sobre la Violencia

3330/A0/04/201/006.status_value: En 2013 se desarrollará la base de la estrategia de prevención de la vionencia contra la niñez y adolescencia
3330/A0/04/201/006.indicator_name: Una campaña nacional para la prevención de violencia contra la niñez y adolescencia  consistente con la CDN y el Estudio Mundial sobre la Violencia

3330/A0/05/882/001.headline: There was progress in the process that will allow Panama to have a legal framework for the protection system following CRC recommendations.

3330/A0/04/202/007.status_value: Existe diálogo con contrapartes gubernamentales para establecer productos que puedan ayudar con la incorporación de los indicadores multidimensionales de privaciones.
3330/A0/04/202/007.indicator_name: Número de programas anti-pobreza que incorporan los indicadores multidimensionales de Bristol para medir el impacto de los programas en la niñez

3330/A0/05/882/003.indicator_name: Study on compliance with human rights standards in custody and detention centers
3330/A0/05/882/003.headline: The juvenile justice system advanced in the application of human rights standards.  A strategy to strengthen alternative measures to imprisonment through capacity development and evidence generation was a step forward to support the Government in complying with CRC recommendations.

3330/A0/05/882/002.indicator_name: "Municipalities that implement local protocols for the protection of children from violence  abuse and neglect "
3330/A0/05/882/002.headline: UNICEF's works on the deinstitutionalization of children and prevention of all forms of violence in support of the Government of Panama is contribuiting to the changes in the lives of children without parental care.

3330/A0/05/882/002.indicator_name: Municipalities that implement local protocols for the protection of children from violence  abuse and neglect
3330/A0/05/882/002.headline: UNICEF's works on the deinstitutionalization of children and prevention of all forms of violence in support of the Government of Panama is contribuiting to the changes in the lives of children without parental care.

3330/A0/05/882/004.headline: Despite continued efforts to make children visible in public investment  and in methodological decisions towards the multiple deprivations index  progress in 2016 has been limited.
